Title: The Truth (2)
Plot: When an unexpected person comes to Mulder's rescue, Mulder refuses to slip north over the border to safety. Instead, he heads southwest to the Anasazi ruins of New Mexico seeking a mysterious wise man who the Indians call "The Keeper of the Truth".
GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Matthew Glave, Jeff Gulka, Chris Owens, Steven Williams, Adam Baldwin, Alan Dale
